title: Hershey's quarterly sales beat estimates
text:
11 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago Hershey's quarterly sales beat estimates Reuters Staff 1 Hershey Co ( HSY.N ) reported better-than-expected quarterly sales on Thursday, helped by strong sales of its chocolates including Kisses and Reeseâ€™s Peanut Butter Cups in North America. FILE PHOTO: Packets of Reese's peanut butter cups, a Hershey product, are displayed at a gas station in Phoenix, Arizona October 27, 2011. REUTERS/Joshua Lott
Sales rose 4.9 percent to $1.97 billion (1.4 billion pounds), beating the average analyst estimate of $1.94 billion, according to Thomson Reuters I/B/E/S.
Net income attributable to Hershey rose to $350.2 million, or $1.65 per share, in the first quarter ended April 1, from $125 million, or 58 cents per share, a year earlier. Reporting by Vibhuti Sharma in Bengaluru; Editing by Saumyadeb Chakrabarty
